alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 11:56AM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For Today`s High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph are expected. For Wednesday`s High Wind Warning, southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph are expected. * WHERE...Northern and Southern Sangre De Cristos and the Wet Mountain Valley. * WHEN...For the first High Wind Warning, from noon today to 6 PM MST this evening. For the second High Wind Warning, from noon to 7 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. Blowdowns are possible, especially in freshly burned areas.
